thread.title_full: Hotel, tourism sector to create million jobs by 2020 in AngolaTravelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Hotel, tourism sector to create million jobs by 2020 in AngolaTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Hotel, tourism sector to create million jobs by 2020 in Angola Published on : Saturday, September 5, 2015
The hotel and tourism sector in Angola is likely to generate a million of direct and indirect jobs by 2020. The announcement was made by Paulino Baptista, the Secretary of State for Hotel and Tourism Ministry.
Paulino Baptista made the statement during the closing act of the First Forum of Training for Tourism, under the slogan “Needs, Challenges and Opportunities”.
The Secretary highlighted the need of redoubled efforts from everyone to implement policies that foster the emergence of qualified manpower to meet the demands of the hotel and tourism market.
Angola has seen high growth in the hotel and tourism sector in recent years.
Also, the Master Plan for Angolan tourism approved recently expects to record 4.6 million tourists throughout the country, out of which 60 percent will be Angolans. The tourism sector is slated to earn revenue worth 4.7 billion US dollars until the referred period as per the Master Plan for Angolan tourism.
